Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.god

Class God

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.god.God
Direct Known Subclasses:
Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Charon, Demeter, Hephaestus, Hestia, Medusa, Minotaur, Pan, Poseidon, Prometheus, Zeus
public abstract class God
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • God

      protected God​(GodDescription godDescription, Player player, GameState gameState)
      Default constructor, can be called only by GodsFactory
      Parameters:
      godDescription - The godDescription that corresponds to the selected god
      gameState - instance of the game
      player - player that chose this god

      public Worker getCurrentWorker()

    • tileToMove

      public java.util.Collection<Tile.IndexTile> tileToMove​(Tile.IndexTile indexTile)
      Parameters:
      indexTile - is the current position for the worker
      Returns:
      default collection of tiles where the worker can go

    • move

      public void move​(Tile.IndexTile indexTile) throws AlreadyOccupiedException
      Parameters:
      indexTile - is the tile chosen by the player to move the worker selected at the beginning of the turn.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if tile chosen is not in tileToMove List
      AlreadyOccupiedException - if the tile chosen has a worker yet
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - Thrown if current operation in turn is not MOVE

    • handleWinningCondition

      protected void handleWinningCondition()

    • tileToBuild

      public java.util.Collection<Tile.IndexTile> tileToBuild​(Tile.IndexTile indexTile)
      Parameters:
      indexTile - indexTile: index of the tile where the worker stands
      Returns:
      default collection of tiles where the worker can build
      See Also:
      Tile

    • build

      public void build​(Tile.IndexTile indexTile) throws DomeAlreadyPresentException
      Parameters:
      indexTile - is the tile chosen by the player to let his worker build
      Throws:
      DomeAlreadyPresentException - if tile at position indexTile contains a dome

    • cannotMove

      public boolean cannotMove()
      it checks if both the workers of the current player cannot move, so the player is declared looser
      Returns:
      true if player cannot move his workers

    • cannotBuild

      public boolean cannotBuild()
      Returns:
      true if current worker cannot build

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • getTurnOperations

      public abstract java.util.Queue<Operation> getTurnOperations()
      Returns:
      operations that the player can make during his turn, due to his God power

    • getRemainingOperations

      public java.util.Queue<Operation> getRemainingOperations()
      used by gods that change the normal execution of a player's turn
      Returns:
      queue of operations remaining in the current turn

    • resetGodState

      public void resetGodState()
      Every time a player starts his turn, his god is reset to his initial state

    • applyChoice

      public void applyChoice​(boolean confirm)
      Used when the user has to make a choice that changes his turn logic. not all classes need to implement this method if their power does not involve any player's choice
      Parameters:
      confirm - : the choice of the player

    • isChooseAvailable

      public boolean isChooseAvailable()

    • findNotCurrentWorker

      protected Worker findNotCurrentWorker()
      Returns:
      the worker not selected for this turn
